Holly Willoughby was horrified as Richard Keys’ wife Julia Keys revealed the moment she realised her husband was having an affair with their daughter’s friend. 
The 57-year-old counsellor revealed she started to think her Sky Sports presenter husband was cheating on her when he was being extremely “overprotective” with his phone. 
But it wasn’t until a party where their daughter’s 27-year-old friend Lucie Rose turned up that she realised it was her he was seeing. 
Speaking on This Morning, she told Holly and Phillip Schofield: “She hadn’t been invited to the party, but she was a friend to someone who was, so it didn’t register with me. Read More
